name: Ballon Poppin' Action Game
description:
In this fast and exciting game you will have to collect and pop loads of ballons and gems! Discover the wonderful designed levels... BUT be aware of the short time limits and those nasty bombs!


The full version offers:

► More than 100 (onehundred!) levels!

► Each level has been designed individually!

► Increasing difficulty!

► Intuitive gameplay (touch, tap, draw)!

► Boost your concentration and coordination!

► Auto-Save-Function

► Big fun for adults and kids!

► High Score Database






..............................



"Great game, one of the best that I have ever played..."

"This app has a chance to be a real classic!"

"My daughter loves this game as well as I do. Good job!"
